original: @105b * // sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor chog bzhugs /
analyzed: @105b * // sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor chog bzhugs /
translated: The Inner Torma Offering to Tārā

original: # // rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: # // rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Venerable Tārā.

original: gtor ma gtong bar 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: gtor ma gtong bar 'dod pa yis //
translated: Those who wish to offer tormas

original: mtshan ldan bkra shis snod de ni //
analyzed: mtshan ldan bkra shis snod de ni //
translated: should fill a pure, auspicious vessel🔽with meat, the five nectars,

original: sha dang bdud rtsi sna lnga dang // khrag dang chang sna tshogs kyis dgang //
analyzed: sha dang bdud rtsi sna lnga dang // khrag dang chang sna tshogs kyis dgang //
translated: blood, and various kinds of alcohol.

original: rlung dang skyed bu me yis bskol //
analyzed: rlung dang skyed bu me yis bskol //
translated: Stir it with wind, the life-force, and fire.

original: sku gsung thugs sngags sbyangs nas ni //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs sngags sbyangs nas ni //
translated: Purify it with the mantras of awakened body, speech, and mind.

original: rang mdun 'khor lo mchod nas ni //
analyzed: rang mdun 'khor lo mchod nas ni //
translated: Offer it to the wheel in front of oneself.

original: sngags kyis btab la 'dod gsol gdab //
analyzed: sngags kyis btab la 'dod gsol gdab //
translated: Consecrate it with the mantra and make supplications.

original: bshags dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo //
analyzed: bshags dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo //
translated: Confess and dedicate the roots of virtue.

original: nam: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a na /
analyzed: nam: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a na /
translated: namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ

original: @106a * // he he bha ga ba ti /
analyzed: @106a * // he he bha ga ba ti /
translated: he he bhagavati

original: ma h'a satva sarba buddha /
analyzed: ma h'a satva sarba buddha /
translated: mahāsattve sarvabuddha

original: aa ba lo ki ti /
analyzed: aa ba lo ki ti /
translated: avalokite

original: ma bi lam pa t'a ra ae ka dz'a ti /
analyzed: ma bi lam pa t'a ra ae ka dz'a ti /
translated: ma vilambapātāyai ekajāṭi

original: ai dam ba lim grihn'a pa ya h'um /
analyzed: ai dam ba lim grihn'a pa ya h'um /
translated: idaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇāpaya hūṃ

original: sarba bi sa re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba bi sa re sv'a h'a /
translated: sarvaviṣare svāhā🔽Hūṃ. Assembly of deities of the lotus family,

original: h'um padma rigs kyi lha tshogs dang // thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs //
analyzed: h'um padma rigs kyi lha tshogs dang // thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs //
translated: great compassionate Avalokiteśvara,

original: rje btsun sgrol ma ral gcig ma //
analyzed: rje btsun sgrol ma ral gcig ma //
translated: And the Venerable One, the One-Faced One with Loose Hair.

original: mchod pa dam pa 'bul ba ni //
analyzed: mchod pa dam pa 'bul ba ni //
translated: I offer the most excellent worship🔽To Gaurī, Caṇḍī,

original: dkar mo dang ni stobs chen mo //🔽rtsub mo dang ni rlag byed ma //
analyzed: dkar mo dang ni stobs chen mo // rtsub mo dang ni rlag byed ma //
translated: Vajrī, Vetālī,🔽Ghasmarī, Pukkasī,🔽Caurī, Ghasmarī, and Caṇḍālī,

original: nag mo mtshan mo nag mo dang // srung ba mo dang sbed byed ma //🔽tshangs mo dang ni rig byed ma //🔽gsang ba mo dang bkra shis ma //
analyzed: nag mo mtshan mo nag mo dang // srung ba mo dang sbed byed ma // tshangs mo dang ni rig byed ma // gsang ba mo dang bkra shis ma //
translated: to Ḍombinī, and to the One with the Skull Bowl,🔽to the One with the Staff, and to the One with the Bell,

original: ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
translated: to the One with the Vajra, and to the One with the Bell.🔽I offer the most excellent worship🔽To the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,

original: grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma //🔽bsod nams gter dang mthar byed ma //
analyzed: grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma // bsod nams gter dang mthar byed ma //
translated: to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,🔽to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell.🔽I offer the most excellent worship🔽To the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,🔽to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,

original: drag mo brtul zhugs chen mo dang // phan mdzad ma dang skyabs byed ma //
analyzed: drag mo brtul zhugs chen mo dang // phan mdzad ma dang skyabs byed ma //
translated: to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell.

original: don grub dang ni nor ster ma //
analyzed: don grub dang ni nor ster ma //
translated: I offer the most excellent worship🔽To the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,🔽to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,

original: ral pa gcig ma 'khor dang bcas //
analyzed: ral pa gcig ma 'khor dang bcas //
translated: to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell.

original: dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: I offer the most excellent worship🔽To the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,🔽to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,

original: ma mo mkha' 'gro ma lus dang // lha dang lha min thams cad rnams //🔽mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bsnams la //
analyzed: ma mo mkha' 'gro ma lus dang // lha dang lha min thams cad rnams // mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bsnams la //
translated: to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell.🔽I offer the most excellent worship🔽To the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,

original: bdag la dngos grub gsol 'debs pas //
analyzed: bdag la dngos grub gsol 'debs pas //
translated: to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell,

original: zang zing lo tog 'bras bu rnams //
analyzed: zang zing lo tog 'bras bu rnams //
translated: to the One with the Bell, and to the One with the Bell.

original: rin po che ni sna tshogs kyi //
analyzed: rin po che ni sna tshogs kyi //
translated: Precious substances of all kinds,

original: dud 'gro rkang 'gros mi nor phyugs //
analyzed: dud 'gro rkang 'gros mi nor phyugs //
translated: Animals, vehicles, wealth, and grain,

original: ro brgya'i zas dang sna tshogs zas //
analyzed: ro brgya'i zas dang sna tshogs zas //
translated: Food of a hundred flavors, various foods,

original: btung ba kha mngar chang sna tshogs //
analyzed: btung ba kha mngar chang sna tshogs //
translated: Drinks, sweet and sour, and various wines,🔽Various kinds of fine, soft clothing,

original: gos bzang srab 'jam sna tshogs dang ; / cang shes glang chen 'dod 'jo'i ba //
analyzed: gos bzang srab 'jam sna tshogs dang ; / cang shes glang chen 'dod 'jo'i ba //
translated: Wish-granting elephants and horses,

original: zhing dang khang pa zangs 'dod 'jo bar //
analyzed: zhing dang khang pa zangs 'dod 'jo bar //
translated: Fields, houses, and wish-granting cows,

original: 'jigs pa brgyad dang bral bar mdzod //
analyzed: 'jigs pa brgyad dang bral bar mdzod //
translated: Free from the eight dangers,

original: bcud len tshe ring nad med mdzod //
analyzed: bcud len tshe ring nad med mdzod //
translated: Elixirs, long life, and good health.🔽May you be victorious over the eight classes of guardians of the directions

original: phyogs skyong sde brgyad tshogs rnams dang // 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal bar mdzod //
analyzed: phyogs skyong sde brgyad tshogs rnams dang // 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal bar mdzod //
translated: And the demon lord of death.

original: ral gri mig sman bum pa bzang //
analyzed: ral gri mig sman bum pa bzang //
translated: May you obtain swords, eye medicine, and excellent vases,🔽Swift feet, treasures, and enjoyments,🔽Sharp intelligence, wisdom, eloquence,🔽And poetry, even without having studied.

original: rkang mgyogs gter dang longs spyod dang // blo rno shes rab tshigs bshad dang // snyan dngags ma thos chos shes shog / rgyal rigs la sogs rigs bzhi rnams //
analyzed: rkang mgyogs gter dang longs spyod dang // blo rno shes rab tshigs bshad dang // snyan dngags ma thos chos shes shog / rgyal rigs la sogs rigs bzhi rnams //
translated: May the four castes, such as the warrior caste,

original: 'gro ba dbang du 'du bar shog / rigs drug ngan song lcags grol shog / gnod dang bdud rnams bar chod zhi //
analyzed: 'gro ba dbang du 'du bar shog / rigs drug ngan song lcags grol shog / gnod dang bdud rnams bar chod zhi //
translated: May harm and demons be pacified.

original: tshe dang stobs dang 'khor rgyas shing //
analyzed: tshe dang stobs dang 'khor rgyas shing //
translated: May my life, strength, and retinue increase.

original: tshe dang chos dang bstan pa dang // bla ma'i sku dgra skad cig sgrol //
analyzed: tshe dang chos dang bstan pa dang // bla ma'i sku dgra skad cig sgrol //
translated: May my life, Dharma, teachings, and the enemies of the guru be liberated in an instant.

original: rtag tu gar skyes gar gnas kyang //
analyzed: rtag tu gar skyes gar gnas kyang //
translated: Wherever I am born and wherever I stay,

original: gsang sngags lam dang mi 'bral zhing //
analyzed: gsang sngags lam dang mi 'bral zhing //
translated: may I never be separated from the path of Secret Mantra.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo longs spyod shog / mdor na rang la ci @106b 'dod pa //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo longs spyod shog / mdor na rang la ci @106b 'dod pa //
translated: May I enjoy the wheel of Dharma.🔽In brief, may all my wishes be fulfilled,

original: bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang // mi 'dod thams cad myur bral nas //
analyzed: bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang // mi 'dod thams cad myur bral nas //
translated: and may all that is unwanted be quickly removed.🔽May the welfare of all sentient beings be accomplished.

original: sems can kun gyi don grub shog / thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi don grub shog / thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs //
translated: May I see the face of Avalokiteśvara, the Great Compassionate One,🔽and the face of Venerable Tārā.

original: rje btsun sgrol ma'i zhal mthong shog / ral pa gcig pa'i dngos grub gnyis //
analyzed: rje btsun sgrol ma'i zhal mthong shog / ral pa gcig pa'i dngos grub gnyis //
translated: May I attain the two accomplishments of Ekajaṭī.

original: bsams shing bsgrub pas myur thob shog / rje btsun sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor ma'i cho ga / slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: bsams shing bsgrub pas myur thob shog / rje btsun sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor ma'i cho ga / slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The inner bali ritual of Venerable Tara, composed by Master Candragomin, is complete.

original: // / yul bal po rdzong du bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / yul bal po rdzong du bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated in the Nepalese district.
